definition: to pass oneself off as sb/to palm sth off as
to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless
to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full

sentences.english: The fruit seller palmed off some bad oranges onto the old lady.
sentences.chinese: 那水果商把一些坏桔子混充好的卖给了那位老大娘。

definition: ruthless and lacking in conscience/vicious mind full of hatred and jealousy/black core (flaw in pottery)
(coll.) (Tw) to defend an untenable position with ridiculous arguments (Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [ngē-áu])/Taiwan pr. [ying4 ao1]
to muddle things up/to goof off/to hang around
(Tw) (of the police) to bury a crime (i.e. conceal the existence of a criminal case in order to improve crime-solving statistics or in return for a bribe etc)
going from there to lower grades (idiom)
